idea-plugin.name: Tally
idea-plugin.description:
Lint, format, and auto-fix Dockerfiles and Containerfiles in IntelliJ.

  • BuildKit-native diagnostics plus Hadolint-compatible and modernization rules.
  • Safe quick fixes and Fix All actions from the editor.
  • Config-aware behavior with .tally.toml / tally.toml discovery.
  • No Docker daemon required.
